title: Heartbeat for Android Wear
summary: Connect any Bluetooth heart rate sensor to your watch ! PHONE LESS !
description: Tired of exchanging your smart watch for your sports watch ? Tired of those inaccurate built in sensors ? Heartbeat for Android Wear is there for you ! Get your heart rate in real time over Bluetooth via your smart watch.1. Wear your heart rate sensor and make sure it's on. [Tested with Polar H7]2. Run the application on your watch. [Tested with LG Urbane]3. Select in the application your heart rate sensor.4. Enjoy your sport ! —> Enjoy your heart rate in a notification card by pressing the hardware button on your watch.***Please note, the application has only been tested with the Polar H7 Sensor and the LG Urbane Watch. ***Please note, some bluetooth sensor cannot provide Bluetooth AND Ant+/Proprietary connection at the same time.If you have any issue, please contact me instead of making a bad review because it will not help the application to grow up.
descriptionHTML:
Tired of exchanging your smart watch for your sports watch ? Tired of those inaccurate built in sensors ? Heartbeat for Android Wear is there for you !

Get your heart rate in real time over Bluetooth via your smart watch.

1. Wear your heart rate sensor and make sure it's on. [Tested with Polar H7]
2. Run the application on your watch. [Tested with LG Urbane]
3. Select in the application your heart rate sensor.
4. Enjoy your sport !

—> Enjoy your heart rate in a notification card by pressing the hardware button on your watch.

***Please note, the application has only been tested with the Polar H7 Sensor and the LG Urbane Watch.
***Please note, some bluetooth sensor cannot provide Bluetooth AND Ant+/Proprietary connection at the same time.

If you have any issue, please contact me instead of making a bad review because it will not help the application to grow up.
